subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: After a surprising benching in Game 3, Martin Brodeur, who has won more than one playoff game only once since 2007, will start Game 4 for the Devils on Thursday.
snippet: After a surprising benching in Game 3, Martin Brodeur, who has won more than one playoff game only once since 2007, will start Game 4 for the Devils on Thursday.
